review: Would like to see a web browser without having to sideload and get a keyboard. Would use amazon prime if more episodes were included such as disney, bravo. With these additions I could see five stars

review: keeps losing it's wireless connection and i have to reset it to defaults settings to get it to work , it scans for networks but takes forever and doesn't locate the router and it's only 5 feet away. Ready to request a refund and return auth.

review: No more cable for me.  I love the fire stick!!!  My favorite feature is the ability to mirror my Kindle Fire 8.9 HDX.
